apps.title: Espresso
apps.tagLine: A Clojurescript library for building HTTP servers on NodeJS
apps.description: A wrapper around NodeJS's "http" module for processing HTTP requests in a more idiomatically clojure way.

apps.title: Left Over Band website
apps.tagLine: A website for Left Over band
apps.description: A dynamic website that uses google calendar API and dropbox API to provide content and information about a friend's band. Deployed as a couple of AWS lambda functions.

apps.title: Vow
apps.tagLine: A Clojure / Clojurescript library for composing asynchronous flows
apps.description: A library for handling asynchronous code similar to Javascript promises. Includes plenty of functions and macros for composability and readability.

apps.title: This Website
apps.description: I use my portfolio as a touchstone for experimenting with and comparing various front-end technologies.

apps.title: Git Push It
apps.description: An open source project for playing git-appropriate music while pushing your code with git.

apps.title: Pizza Time
apps.description: Is it ever not pizza time? Check out this clock and find out.
